name: United Cerebral Palsy of the Golden Gate
description: United Cerebral Palsy of the Golden Gate (UPGG) provides and facilitates services and resources to empower people with disabilities to be independent and achieve total integration into their communities. They offer the following support programs: - Everyone In After School Program - Special Needs Aquatic Program (SNAP) - UCP Hoops Basketball Camp UPGG envisions a world in which people with disabilities can fully participate in their communities with equality, dignity, and self-determination.
